mapper.select: select m.*,s.name as shopName,s.address as shopAddress,s.longitude as shopLongitude,s.latitude as shopLatitude, u.nickName as userName,u.logo as userLogo,u.mobilePhone as userPhone, u2.nickName as serverName,u2.logo as serverLogo,u2.mobilePhone as serverPhone from menu m join shop_info s on m.sid=s.sid join user_info u on m.uid=u.uid left join user_info u2 on m.wid=u2.uid where m.mid=#{mid} and m.status>0

select m.*,s.name as shopName,s.address as shopAddress,s.longitude as shopLongitude,s.latitude as shopLatitude, u.nickName as userName,u.logo as userLogo,u.mobilePhone as userPhone, u2.nickName as serverName,u2.logo as serverLogo,u2.mobilePhone as serverPhone from menu m join shop_info s on m.sid=s.sid join user_info u on m.uid=u.uid left join user_info u2 on m.wid=u2.uid where
m.uid=#{uid}
m.wid=#{uid}
and (m.status=1 or m.status=2)
and m.status=3
and m.status not in (1,2,3)
order by m.createDate

select m.*,s.name as shopName,u.nickName as userName from menu m join shop_info s on m.sid=s.sid join user_info u on m.uid=u.uid where (m.longitude between #{minlon} and #{maxlon}) and (m.latitude between #{minlat} and #{maxlat}) and m.status=1
select * from menu where mealEndDate < #{mealEndDate} and status=1
